appDesc.description: The 132 char description of the application, displayed in the web store.
appDesc.message: Use Voice Recognition to fill out forms and dictate email with speech to text. Control the Internet with custom voice commands!

appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

chrome_pages_error.message: NOTE: Google does not allow Chrome extensions to work on special chrome:// pages or the Chrome Webstore such as the page on the last tab.

chrome_runtime_error.message: . NOTE: You must reload the web page you were trying to use speech recognition on before this extension will work on it.

network_error.message: Reinstalling Chrome or doing a Chrome Reset may help fix this error.
